title: VictimBody
body:
Jacob Wright. Looks like his death was pretty brutal
I should put some gloves on...
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Head
body:
He vomited before he died...
[[Probably shock|VictimBody.Conclusion.Shock]]
[[Maybe he drank too much whisky|VictimBody.Conclusion.Drunk]]
[[Hard to say why just yet.|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Jacket
body:
There's a fair amount of blood on the jacket.
I'd better check his pockets...
[[Outside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.OutsidePocket]]
[[Inside pocket|VictimBody.Jacket.InsidePocket]]
[[I'll check later|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Torso
body:
Geez... There's a lot of blood here....
[[Examine stomach wound|VictimBody.Torso.Stomach]]
[[Examine chest|VictimBody.Torso.Chest]]

title: VictimBody.Legs
body:
There's a fair amount of blood here.
No wounds though.
[[Check his pockets|VictimBody.Legs.Pockets]]

title: VictimBody.Hands
body:
There's a little bit of blood on his hands.
He's dropped a whisky glass on the floor.
[[Wait, there's another glass on the bench...|VictimBody.Conclusion.Glass]] <<visited ("Whiksy-Glass1")>>
[[Nothing else worth noting here.|VictimBody]]

title: VictimBody.Exit
body:
Don't go anywhere Jacob.
*Chuckles*

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Shock
body:
The victim vomited from the shock of his injuries.
[[Hmm let me rethink this|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Sounds good. I'll add this to my report.|VictimBody.Conclusion.Shock.Confirm]]

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Drunk
body:
The victim was drunk before he died. That's why he vomited.
[[Hmm let me rethink this|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Sounds good. I'll add this to my report.|VictimBody.Conclusion.Drunk.Confirm]]

title: VictimBody.Jacket.InsidePocket
body:
His Wallet.
Hmm. Still full of cash.

title: VictimBody.Jacket.OutsidePocket
body: Lint. Nothing useful here.

title: VictimBody.Torso.Stomach
body:
There's a bullet hole in his stomach.
The alcohol would have made him bleed out much faster than normal...
[[Check the entrance wound|VictimBody.Torso.Stomach.Entrance]]
[[Check for exit wound|VictimBody.Torso.Stomach.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Torso.Chest
body:
There's a lot of bruising around the chest...
His ribs appear to be broken.
[[Perhaps it happened when he fell|VictimBody.Conclusion.Fell]]
[[[CONTRIVED FOR NOW] He must have been attacked|VictimBody.Conclusion.Beaten]]

title: VictimBody.Torso.Stomach.Entrance
body:
Entrance wound is pretty large.
Looks like a high-calibre round...

title: VictimBody.Torso.Stomach.Exit
body:
The exit wound is massive.
A civilian bullet couldn't have left that much of a wound...

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Fell
body: Empty Text

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Beaten
body: Empty Text

title: VictimBody.Legs.Pockets
body: Nothing but loose change..

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Drunk.Confirm
body:
The victim was drunk before he died. That's why he vomited.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]

title: VictimBody.Conclusion.Shock.Confirm
body:
The victim went into shock before he died. That's why he vomited.
[[Examine Head|VictimBody.Head]]
[[Examine Jacket|VictimBody.Jacket]]
[[Examine Torso|VictimBody.Torso]]
[[Examine Hands|VictimBody.Hands]]
[[Examine Legs|VictimBody.Legs]]
[[Look around the room some more|VictimBody.Exit]]
